Subject: Urgent: Suspicious Login Attempt Detected

Dear Valued Microsoft User,

We have recently detected a suspicious login attempt on your Microsoft account. Our security systems have flagged this activity as potentially harmful and we need your immediate assistance to verify if this login was authorized by you.

If you did not attempt to log in to your account from an unfamiliar device or location, please click on the link below to confirm your identity and secure your account:

[Insert Phishing Link Here]

By confirming your identity, you will help us prevent any unauthorized access to your personal information and ensure the safety of your account. Your prompt action is crucial to maintaining the security of your account.

Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. We take the security of your account very seriously and appreciate your attention to this urgent matter.

Sincerely,
Microsoft Security Team

Please note: Microsoft will never ask you for your password or personal information via email. If you have any doubts about the legitimacy of this email, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team immediately.
